1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Token pattern.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Pattern
7  ( -- * Text token
8    pattern TTextUnk,
9    pattern TTextRaw,
10    pattern TTextQ,
11    pattern TTextQQ,
12    pattern TTextKey,
13    pattern TTextBar,
14    pattern TTextLicense,
15    pattern TTextSect,
16
17    -- * Term token
18    pattern TTermPath,
19    pattern TTermQ,
20  ) where
21
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Token  as S
23
24
25-- ----------------------  Text token
26
27-- | Unknown text token.
28pattern TTextUnk cp w = S.TText cp S.TextUnk  w
29
30-- | Raw text token.
31--
32--   >>> S.TTextRaw B.def "a"   -- a
33pattern TTextRaw cp w = S.TText cp S.TextRaw  w
34
35-- | Quoted text token.
36--
37--   >>> S.TTextQ B.def "a"   -- 'a
38pattern TTextQ cp w = S.TText cp S.TextQ    w
39
40-- | Dobule-quoted text token.
41--
42--   >>> S.TTextQQ B.def "a"   -- "a"
43pattern TTextQQ cp w = S.TText cp S.TextQQ   w
44
45-- | Keyword token.
46--
47--   >>> S.TTextKey B.def "a"   -- <a>
48pattern TTextKey cp w = S.TText cp S.TextKey  w
49
50-- | Bar-enclosed token.
51--
52--   >>> S.TTextBar B.def "a"   -- |a|
53pattern TTextBar cp w = S.TText cp S.TextBar  w
54
55-- | License text token.
56pattern TTextLicense cp w = S.TText cp S.TextLicense w
57
58pattern TTextSect cp = TTextRaw cp "==="
59
60
61-- ----------------------  Term token
62
63-- | Term path token.
64--
65--   >>> TTermPath B.def ["a", "b"]   -- /a/b
66pattern TTermPath cp ws = S.TTerm cp S.TermTypePath ws
67
68-- | Quoted term path token.
69--
70--   >>> TTermQ B.def ["a"]   -- '/a
71pattern TTermQ cp ws = S.TTerm cp S.TermTypeQuoted ws
